verses.verse: הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold יֽוֹם־ <WH3117> Behold the day בָּ֖א <WH935> cometh לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְחֻלַּ֥ק <WH2505> shall be divided שְׁלָלֵ֖ךְ <WH7998> and thy spoil בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃ <WH7130> in the midst

וְאָסַפְתִּ֨י <WH622> For I will gather אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם ׀ <WH1471> all nations אֶֽל־ <WH413> against יְרוּשָׁלִַם֮ <WH3389> against Jerusalem לַמִּלְחָמָה֒ <WH4421> to battle וְנִלְכְּדָ֣ה <WH3920> shall be taken הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> and the city וְנָשַׁ֙סּוּ֙ <WH8155> rifled הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <WH1004> and the houses וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> and the women [תִּשָּׁגַלְנָה כ] (תִּשָּׁכַ֑בְנָה <WH7693> lie with ק) וְיָצָ֞א <WH3318> shall go forth חֲצִ֤י <WH2677> and half הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city בַּגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> into captivity וְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> and the residue הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִכָּרֵ֖ת <WH3772> shall not be cut off מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> from the city

וְיָצָ֣א <WH3318> go forth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וְנִלְחַ֖ם <WH3898> and fight בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> against those nations הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> those כְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> as when הִֽלָּחֲמ֖וֹ <WH3898> he fought בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day קְרָֽב׃ <WH7128> of battle

וְעָמְד֣וּ <WH5975> shall stand רַגְלָ֣יו <WH7272> And his feet בַּיּוֹם־ <WH3117> in that day הַ֠הוּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֨ר <WH2022> upon the mount הַזֵּתִ֜ים <WH2132> of Olives אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is in פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> which [is] before יְרוּשָׁלִַם֮ <WH3389> Jerusalem מִקֶּדֶם֒ <WH6924> on the east וְנִבְקַע֩ <WH1234> shall cleave הַ֨ר <WH2022> and the mount הַזֵּיתִ֤ים <WH2132> of Olives מֵֽחֶצְיוֹ֙ <WH2677> in the midst מִזְרָ֣חָה <WH4217> thereof toward the east וָיָ֔מָּה <WH3220> and toward the west גֵּ֖יא <WH1516> valley גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <WH1419> great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [and there shall be] a very וּמָ֨שׁ <WH4185> shall remove חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> and half הָהָ֛ר <WH2022> of the mountain צָפ֖וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north וְחֶצְיוֹ־ <WH2677> and half נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> of it toward the south

וְנַסְתֶּ֣ם <WH5127> And ye shall flee גֵּֽיא־ <WH1516> [to] the valley הָרַ֗י <WH2022> of the mountains כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַגִּ֣יעַ <WH5060> shall reach גֵּי־ <WH1516> for the valley הָרִים֮ <WH2022> of the mountains אֶל־ <WH413> to אָצַל֒ <WH682> unto Azal וְנַסְתֶּ֗ם <WH5127> yea ye shall flee כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> you נַסְתֶּם֙ <WH5127> like as ye fled מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before הָרַ֔עַשׁ <WH7494> the earthquake בִּימֵ֖י <WH3117> in the days עֻזִּיָּ֣ה <WH5818> of Uzziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבָא֙ <WH935> shall come יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהַ֔י <WH430> my God כָּל־ <WH3605> all קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <WH6918> [and] all the saints עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become א֔וֹר <WH216> [that] the light יְקָר֖וֹת <WH3368> shall not be clear [יִקְפְּאוּן כ] (וְקִפָּאֹֽון׃ <WH7087> congeal ק)

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> will come יוֹם־ <WH3117> day אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> But it shall be one ה֛וּא <WH1931> which יִוָּדַ֥ע <WH3045> which shall be known לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> to the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> neither י֣וֹם <WH3117> not day וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> nor night וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> will come לְעֵֽת־ <WH6256> time עֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> but it shall come to pass [that] at evening יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> will come אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> it shall be light

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall be in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יֵצְא֤וּ <WH3318> shall go out מַֽיִם־ <WH4325> waters חַיִּים֙ <WH2416> [that] living מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem חֶצְיָ֗ם <WH2677> half אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> sea הַקַּדְמוֹנִ֔י <WH6931> of them toward the former וְחֶצְיָ֖ם <WH2677> and half אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> sea הָאַחֲר֑וֹן <WH314> of them toward the hinder בַּקַּ֥יִץ <WH7019> in summer וּבָחֹ֖רֶף <WH2779> and in winter יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וְהָיָ֧ה <WH1961> become יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> shall be king עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> over all the earth בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> become יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> LORD אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> shall there be one וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> and his name אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one

יִסּ֨וֹב <WH5437> shall be turned כָּל־ <WH3605> All הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> All the land כָּעֲרָבָה֙ <WH6160> as a plain מִגֶּ֣בַע <WH1387> from Geba לְרִמּ֔וֹן <WH7417> to Rimmon נֶ֖גֶב <WH5045> south יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְֽרָאֲמָה֩ <WH7213> and it shall be lifted up וְיָשְׁבָ֨ה <WH3427> and inhabited תַחְתֶּ֜יהָ <WH8478> site לְמִשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> in her place from Benjamin's עַד־ <WH5704> far מְק֞וֹם <WH4725> unto the place שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> gate הָֽרִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> of the first עַד־ <WH5704> far שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַפִּנִּ֔ים <WH6434> unto the corner וּמִגְדַּ֣ל <WH4026> and [from] the tower חֲנַנְאֵ֔ל <WH2606> of Hananeel עַ֖ד <WH5704> far יִקְבֵ֥י <WH3342> winepresses הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> unto the king's

וְיָ֣שְׁבוּ <WH3427> And [men] shall dwell בָ֔הּ וְחֵ֖רֶם <WH2764> in it and there shall be no more utter destruction לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer וְיָשְׁבָ֥ה <WH3427> inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> but Jerusalem לָבֶֽטַח׃ <WH983> shall be safely

וְזֹ֣את ׀ <WH2063> likewise תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become הַמַּגֵּפָ֗ה <WH4046> And this shall be the plague אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִגֹּ֤ף <WH5062> will smite יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> wherewith the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who צָבְא֖וּ <WH6633> that have fought עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem הָמֵ֣ק ׀ <WH4743> shall consume away בְּשָׂר֗וֹ <WH1320> Their flesh וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> they עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> while they stand עַל־ <WH5921> against רַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> upon their feet וְעֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> and their eyes תִּמַּ֣קְנָה <WH4743> shall consume away בְחֹֽרֵיהֶ֔ן <WH2356> in their holes וּלְשׁוֹנ֖וֹ <WH3956> and their tongue תִּמַּ֥ק <WH4743> shall consume away בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <WH6310> in their mouth

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he תִּֽהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> will fall מְהֽוּמַת־ <WH4103> tumult יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> from the LORD רַבָּ֖ה <WH7227> [that] a great בָּהֶ֑ם וְהֶחֱזִ֗יקוּ <WH2388> shall be among them and they shall lay hold אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every one יַ֣ד <WH3027> on the hand רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> of his neighbour וְעָלְתָ֥ה <WH5927> shall rise up יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> and his hand עַל־ <WH5921> against יַ֥ד <WH3027> against the hand רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> of his neighbour

וְגַ֨ם־ <WH1571> also יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> And Judah תִּלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> also shall fight בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem וְאֻסַּף֩ <WH622> shall be gathered together חֵ֨יל <WH2428> and the wealth כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <WH1471> of all the heathen סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> round about זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold וָכֶ֛סֶף <WH3701> and silver וּבְגָדִ֖ים <WH899> and apparel לָרֹ֥ב <WH7230> abundance מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> in great

וְכֵ֨ן <WH3651> So תִּֽהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> become מַגֵּפַ֣ת <WH4046> And so shall be the plague הַסּ֗וּס <WH5483> of the horse הַפֶּ֙רֶד֙ <WH6505> of the mule הַגָּמָ֣ל <WH1581> of the camel וְהַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> and of the ass וְכָ֨ל־ <WH3605> and all הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> and of all the beasts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become בַּמַּחֲנ֣וֹת <WH4264> tents הָהֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> that shall be in these כַּמַּגֵּפָ֖ה <WH4046> as this plague הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> it

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> will come כָּל־ <WH3605> any הַנּוֹתָר֙ <WH3498> And it shall come to pass [that] every one that is left מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of all the nations הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> which came עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וְעָל֞וּ <WH5927> shall even go up מִדֵּ֧י <WH1767> from שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year בְשָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> to year לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹת֙ <WH7812> to worship לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the King יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְלָחֹ֖ג <WH2287> and to keep אֶת־ <WH853> חַ֥ג <WH2282> the feast הַסֻּכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5521> of tabernacles

וְ֠הָיָה <WH1961> will be that אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whichever לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יַעֲלֶ֜ה <WH5927> And it shall be [that] whoso will not come up מֵאֵ֨ת <WH853> מִשְׁפְּח֤וֹת <WH4940> of [all] the families הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the earth אֶל־ <WH413> to יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֔ת <WH7812> to worship לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the King יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> will be no עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become הַגָּֽשֶׁם׃ <WH1653> even upon them shall be no rain

וְאִם־ <WH518> If מִשְׁפַּ֨חַת <WH4940> And if the family מִצְרַ֧יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תַעֲלֶ֛ה <WH5927> go not up וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no בָאָ֖ה <WH935> and come וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> and תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become הַמַּגֵּפָ֗ה <WH4046> not that [have] no [rain] there shall be the plague אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִגֹּ֤ף <WH5062> will smite יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> wherewith the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יַֽעֲל֔וּ <WH5927> that come not up לָחֹ֖ג <WH2287> to keep אֶת־ <WH853> חַ֥ג <WH2282> the feast הַסֻּכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5521> of tabernacles

זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise תִּהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become חַטַּ֣את <WH2403> This shall be the punishment מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְחַטַּאת֙ <WH2403> and the punishment כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of all nations אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יַֽעֲל֔וּ <WH5927> that come not up לָחֹ֖ג <WH2287> to keep אֶת־ <WH853> חַ֥ג <WH2282> the feast הַסֻּכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5521> of tabernacles

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> and מְצִלּ֣וֹת <WH4698> shall there be upon the bells הַסּ֔וּס <WH5483> of the horses קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> HOLINESS לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> UNTO THE LORD וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become הַסִּירוֹת֙ <WH5518> and the pots בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> in the LORD'S כַּמִּזְרָקִ֖ים <WH4219> shall be like the bowls לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> the altar

וְ֠הָיָה <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> Every סִ֨יר <WH5518> Yea every pot בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וּבִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> and in Judah קֹ֚דֶשׁ <WH6944> shall be holiness לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וּבָ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> shall come כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַזֹּ֣בְחִ֔ים <WH2076> and all they that sacrifice וְלָקְח֥וּ <WH3947> and take מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> of them וּבִשְּׁל֣וּ <WH1310> of them and seethe בָהֶ֑ם וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will no יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> be a כְנַעֲנִ֥י <WH3669> there shall be no more the Canaanite ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> therein and in that day הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he
